players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is dead. I investigated Diana last night and found that she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out."
Diana: "Charlie, you're just trying to frame me! If you're really the detective, why reveal so fast? Sounds suspicious—I think you're the mafioso."
You: "I'm not sure who to trust yet. Charlie, can you explain why you investigated Diana and revealed so quickly?"
You: "I'm leaning towards believing Charlie, but I need one more reason from him before we vote."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. My investigation confirmed it. It's crucial we eliminate her now to protect ourselves."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why rush and not gather more info? You're acting guilty—vote for Charlie instead!"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

You: "Diana is the mafioso. My investigation confirmed it. It's crucial we eliminate her now to protect ourselves."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is dead. I investigated Diana last night and found that she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out."
You: "Charlie, you're just trying to frame me! If you're really the detective, why reveal so fast? Sounds suspicious—I think you're the mafioso."
Bob: "I'm not sure who to trust yet. Charlie, can you explain why you investigated Diana and revealed so quickly?"
Bob: "I'm leaning towards believing Charlie, but I need one more reason from him before we vote."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. My investigation confirmed it. It's crucial we eliminate her now to protect ourselves."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why rush and not gather more info? You're acting guilty—vote for Charlie instead!"
